item.description:
Hi, folks. Here's our second Meetup of 2010. Details to come, but the swap themes are: #1, Valentine's Day. #2: Ribbons (make a card from or with ribbons). We'll also finish the January swaps, have a rubber-stamping demo, another round of real-time "jam" cards and more. See you then!

The church says we can start at 1:30 instead of 2, so feel free to show up anytime after 1:30. (I'll be there at 1 to set up.)

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: February 2010 NE ATC+ Meetup--note SUNDAY date and 2 p.m. start time
